description: A former fishing trawler spaceship owned by Jet Black and refitted to serve as a mobile base for bounty hunting. Contains enough living space to house at least 4 people and one dog. Bebop isn`t equipped with any kind of defensive or offensive weaponry but internal hangars may uphold at least 3 fighter class ships. It is also capable of interplanetary jumpgate travel and planet water landing.
name: Bebop
